spec-wo-078-logic.instruction: Draft the detailed logic for Fractional Reserve Banking (WO-078). This spec MUST reference and align with the IBankService defined in the attached context. Focus on: 1. Credit Creation flow. 2. LTV/DTI constraints for agents. 3. Bank solvency management.

td-126-impl.instruction: 공식 승인된 'design/specs/TD-126_Bank_Interface_Spec.md' 명세에 따라 IBankService 인터페이스를 구축하세요. Household와 Firm이 기존의 구체 클래스(Bank) 대신 이 인터페이스를 통해 상호작용하도록 리팩토링하여 시스템 결합도를 낮추어야 합니다.
td-126-impl.title: TD-126: Formalize IBankService Protocol (Implementation)
